text:
HomeAdvisor, QA Automation Engineer, Golden, CO, ONSITE

I'm looking for a top notch Selenium automation engineer that can come in and help clean up an existing repo of scripts, and also help define the architecture to be used going forward. We have put a lot of focus on our automation efforts, and full buy-in & support from executive leadership as well as the dev leadership & teams.

Why HomeAdvisor: http://www.abouthomeadvisor.com/careers/

Job Description: http://homeadvisor.submit4jobs.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=8307...
